About
===========================

The Discord Help Directory Bot Api was written to help
connect Pro level programmers with other programmers
in the `discord chat <https://discord.gg/72fJB1/>`_.

Development
------------------
If you would like to help with the development of the api,
please visit the `github repo <https://github.com/seekheart/discord_db_api/>`_

Bug Reports and Feature Requests
-----------------
Please submit all bug reports and feature requests in the
github repo.
